long_prompt: A vibrant palm umbrella, with a sturdy wooden pole and a broad, curved canopy, is being held aloft by a young boy standing on a smooth, curved, wavy skateboard, gliding effortlessly through a sun-drenched beachside park.
A palm umbrella, its delicate fronds swaying gently in the breeze, provides shade for a vibrant, wavy skateboard resting on a sun-drenched beach, with the sound of waves crashing in the background.
